alert.note: Alert for Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 5:42AM EST until December 19 at 7:37PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek at Gilboa Bridge. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Major flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 13.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 20.8 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Gilboa Bridge Flood Stage: 17.0 Observed Stage at Mon 5 am: 13.7 Forecast: Mon 7 am 14.2 Mon 1 pm 17.0 Mon 7 pm 19.7 Tue 1 am 20.8 Tue 7 am 19.1 Tue 1 pm 17.1 Tue 7 pm 16.1 Wed 1 am 15.4 Wed 7 am 14.9 Wed 1 pm 14.5 Wed 7 pm 14.1 Thu 1 am 13.9 &&
